4.12 The OLE-AUTOMATION module

HRESULT-FROM-WIN32

Function

Summary

HRESULT-FROM-WIN32 error-code => status

Arguments

error-code
An instance of <integer>.

Values

status
An instance of <SCODE>.

Description

Given an integer Windows error code, such as returned by Windows function GetLastError, return the corresponding <SCODE> value.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
